name: Tiny Blues vs. Mini Reds
summary: Two kingdoms, Red and Blue, neighbor each other, but instead of living peacefully, they are constantly fighting and competing to determine whose army is stronger. Both states continue to increase their armaments, which periodically leads to military conflicts. You can experience one of these conflicts in the game "Tiny Blues Vs Mini Reds. The blue dictator has invited you as commander-in-chief to ensure that he wins the war and puts an end to this age-old dispute. Place tanks against the red armored vehicles, use radar to drop crates on the field in which you will find money and useful bonuses.
